response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Considering its value and the potential it holds for you, I am extending this opportunity at a special introductory price of $12,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an exceptional value compared to its market worth of $15,000. I look forward to hearing your decision soon. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 12000}
